alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 21 at 7:16PM EDT until May 21 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of Southeast Indiana, Northern Kentucky and Southwest Ohio, including the following counties, in Southeast Indiana, Dearborn and Ohio. In Northern Kentucky, Boone. In Southwest Ohio, Hamilton. * WHEN...Until 830 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 716 PM EDT, local law enforcement reported minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Lawrenceburg, Greendale, Aurora, Hidden Valley, Cleves, Dillsboro, Shawnee, Wilmington, French, Hartford, North Bend, Petersburg, Idlewild, Elizabethtown, Farmers Retreat, Francisville, Hooven and Hebron.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Keep children away from storm drains, culverts, creeks and streams. Water levels can rise rapidly and sweep children away. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
